mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY st_id ORDER BY sbo_no desc) sbo_re_no, s.* FROM sboard s) WHERE (sbo_re_no BETWEEN #{sbo_first} AND #{sbo_last}) AND st_id = #{st_id} ORDER BY sbo_re_no
SELECT * FROM sboard WHERE st_id = #{st_id} and sbo_hashtag like '%' || #{sbo_hashtag} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sboard( sbo_no, sbo_title, st_id, sbo_time, sbo_content , sbo_hashtag ) VALUES( bo_seq.NEXTVAL, #{sbo_title}, #{st_id}, SYSDATE, #{sbo_content} , #{sbo_hashtag} )
